== Version 1.3 ==
When an error occurs in SQL statements, the program runs until the end anyway.

Moreover, SQL statements parsing was improved with the use of a regular expression.

You can download the jar file and the associated files below. Choose your archive format.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/dbsynchro/downloads/detail?name=DbSyncrho-1.3.tar.gz&can=2&q= .tar.gz]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/dbsynchro/downloads/detail?name=DbSynchro-1.3.zip&can=2&q= .zip]


== Version 1.2 ==
All the program has been updated. Now it offers the possibility to specify various sources and targets.

You can have a look at both config.xml and statements.sql to see how it works.
